title: Emerald and Polki Kundan Earrings - Pachala Polki Kammalu
materials: White CZ accents. This features the finest Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
features: These earrings feature a square stud design with a central Polki diamond, surrounded by vibrant green emerald enamel detailing. The design continues with smaller Polki diamonds connecting to a teardrop shape with the same Polki and Enamel scheme. The Polki diamonds are intricately set in a closed setting, a hallmark of traditional Indian jewelry. The green enamel adds a refreshing touch, creating a unique contrast.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. These earrings complement traditional South Indian attire beautifully
and also suit contemporary outfits with a touch of ethnicity.
description: These Polki Jhumkas blend classic elegance with a modern twist. The use of emerald enamel offers a refreshing alternative to traditional ruby or kempu stones. The high-quality Polki diamonds ensure brilliance and add to the overall richness of the piece. The Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees superior quality and durability, making them a valuable addition to your jewelry collection.
